tool_description: Calculate the love between two name with two differente deterministic methods.
title: Simple Love Calculator

api_list.name: calculate_with_random_seed
api_list.description: Get the love-percentage by generating a deterministic random value which is based on the seed, created from the two names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/calculate_with_random_seed/{name1}/{name2}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: calculate_with_counting_chars
api_list.description: Get the love-percentage by counting the characters on a special way of both names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/calculate_with_counting_chars/{name1}/{name2}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
